name: Sparta Global
slogan: Tech training academy for grads who want to launch their careers as tech consultants
description:
The Sparta Academy is a tech academy within a consultancy. We train up high-potential graduates from all educational backgrounds to be work-ready web developers, software testers, test automation engineers and dev ops engineers. After graduating from their bootcamp stream in one of these areas, Spartans are partnered with clients from our partner base, where they start contributing to real projects and building up the experience and knowledge of how to make businesses better. As well as the latest in practical tech skills, our Spartans are savvy, friendly and smart in all the other ways that are just as important as technical know how.

Our Academy is passionate about getting more young people from all backgrounds into tech and creating and building the products of tomorrow. We believe in providing our training to our trainees for free. We stay fresh by harnessing the experience of industry specialists to teach our different streams and we believe learning never stops.

jobs.title: Technology Consultant
jobs.description:
Sparta Global - “Female Grad Employer of the Year” winner at the Women in Tech awards 2018 
 
Technology is everywhere. We are a community of engineers who can analyse our clients’ business needs and use technology to help companies through their digital transformation, in turn making a positive impact on society. Sparta Global is the “Female Grad Employer of the Year” winner at the Women in Tech awards 2018 and we are now looking for amazing graduates to join us and become the next generation of leaders in tech.  
 
We employ people with different backgrounds to help our clients effectively, so our consultants have come from a wide range of STEM degrees as well as from Business, Arts and Humanities. We invest in your career from the get go by offering commercially relevant training and live business case studies, labs and workshops as part of our Graduate Scheme. Following the training, our consultants get to work on a 2-year rotational programme to deliver a variety of digital transformation projects, combining business and technical acumen to help clients design the best strategies and solve business problems.  
 
Graduates here get to work with some the biggest names in industry including some of the FTSE 500 companies. You’ll carry out business analysis working with inspirational leaders on client site, you’ll work on exciting projects that make a huge ROI impact for the clients and you’ll make recommendations that can change the way in which companies do business, think about the future and hence make a big impact on society as a whole. 
 
What does it take to become a Spartan?  
 
-Is sensitive to clients’ needs, can draw insights and use creativity in ways that help companies grow and improve.  
-Has a strong and positive work ethic. 
-Likes to work constructively in team environments, is supportive of others and can influence positive change.  
-Is intellectually curious, shares knowledge and experience and is passionate about learning.  
-Uses initiative to generate fresh ideas and innovative solutions.  
 
Vacancies: We are looking to hire over 250 new Graduate Consultants in 2019 alone. 
 
Recruitment Criteria: We are looking for graduates with a passion for Business and who are keen to develop their skillset through continuous personal and professional development.
